books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A downsized Wall Street lawyer joins a legal clinic in a small Virginia town, and becomes involved both in real people’s lives and in litigation against the coal mining industry.
books.name: GRAY MOUNTAIN

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?
books.name: GONE GIRL

books.author: by Jodi Picoult
books.description: After searching for her mother, who has disappeared, for more than 10 years, a woman employs a psychic and a detective.
books.name: LEAVING TIME

books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: Twenty-five years after their high school romance ended, two classmates return to their North Carolina town for a funeral.
books.name: THE BEST OF ME

books.author: by James Patterson and Michael Ledwidge
books.description: Detective Michael Bennett, back in New York City, investigates a peculiar crime in Harlem.
books.name: BURN

books.author: by John Sandford
books.description: Dognappers and a murdered reporter draw the attention of the Minnesota investigator Virgil Flowers.
books.name: DEADLINE

books.author: by Anthony Doerr
books.description: The lives of a blind French girl and a gadget-obsessed German boy before and during World War II.
books.name: ALL THE LIGHT WE CANNOT SEE

books.author: by Jay Crownover
books.description: Rowdy St. James isn't going to be burned by love twice. Then his new co-worker arrives.
books.name: ROWDY

books.author: by Sophie Kinsella
books.description: Becky Brandon relocates to Los Angeles, and is offered a job as a stylist for an actress — unfortunately, the rival of the actress for whom her husband does P.R.
books.name: SHOPAHOLIC TO THE STARS

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman who, as a child, was spared when her mother and sisters were murdered begins to reinvestigate the case against her imprisoned brother.
books.name: DARK PLACES

books.author: by Penelope Ward
books.description: A bond, and an attraction, between two stepsiblings.
books.name: STEPBROTHER DEAREST

books.author: by Ken Follett
books.description: Five interrelated families grapple with the events of the 1960s through the 1980s; Book 3 of the Century Trilogy.
books.name: EDGE OF ETERNITY

books.author: by Lee Child
books.description: Jack Reacher, a former military cop, helps the State Department and the C.I.A. stop a sniper who has targeted a G8 summit.
books.name: PERSONAL

books.author: by Christina Baker Kline
books.description: A historical novel about orphans swept off the streets of New York and sent to the Midwest in the 1920s.
books.name: ORPHAN TRAIN

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: After a stay at a psychiatric hospital, a reporter returns (reluctantly) to her hometown to cover the murders of two girls.
books.name: SHARP OBJECTS
